title: WTB: T206 oddities, miscuts, color variations
author: Comiskey

posts.post_title: WTB: T206 oddities, miscuts, color variations
posts.post_content:
Looking for T206 miscuts, oddities, and variations. Would really like printers scrap. Let me know what you have available.

Jeff W
[url]Jwilliams81@mac.com[/url]
Here's one I'd trade for something I need.  I am trying to complete a basic HOFer set with all the backs.  I still need some of the rarer ones.

I have a 

Downey SGC 40 Tolstoi Wet Sheet Transfer
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206downeytolstoi40.jpg[/IMG]

Admiral Schlei SGC 30 Old Mill Ghost Image
[IMG]http://www.thetoyheaven.com/images/items/baseballcards/bbct206schleioldmill30.jpg[/IMG]

Not sure if these are what your looking for but feel free to drop me an email if interested.  Thanks

James G
